attributes.action: Ban the viewing of Love Island in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
An article by The Guardian supports the latter:
https://www.theguardian.com/society/2019/may/15/one-in-three-uk-teenagers-ashamed-of-their-body
attributes.background:
Love Island is lowering young adults self-esteem and self-confidence, they think they look bad, they become depressed, because they see that they cant be like those in the show. Of those watching 20% are obese, and 1 in 3 of those are ashamed of their bodies.
Referred to various sources.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because its about something the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for. OFCOM are responsible for investigating complaints about TV programmes. You can find out more here:

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/tv-radio-and-on-demand/how-to-report-a-complaint
